Module MailRegister
Package mappe.del3.addressregister

Class AddressRegister

java.lang.Object
mappe.del3.addressregister.AddressRegister
public class AddressRegister
extends java.lang.Object
A register of Addresses. The class is singleton. Register stores all addresses added to the application in an ArrayList. Addresses can be added, removed, searched by. The register can also be cleared of all addresses.
Version:
2021-05-14
Author:
Sindre Glomnes

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static AddressRegister getInstance()
      Returns the instance of AddressRegister
      Returns:

    • addAddress

      public void addAddress​(Address address)
      Adds an address to the register. Exception is thrown if the register already contains the address.
      Parameters:
      address - new address

    • removeAddress

      public void removeAddress​(Address address)
      Removes an address from the register. Exception is thrown if the register does not contain the address to be removed.
      Parameters:
      address -

    • searchByZipCode

      public void searchByZipCode​(java.lang.String zipCode)
      Method for searching for addresses based on zipcode. All addresses which starts with this zipcode will be added to the filteredAddressRegister (Arraylist).
      Parameters:
      zipCode - the zipcode searched with.

    • searchByPostal

      public void searchByPostal​(java.lang.String postal)
      Method for searching for addresses based on postal. All addresses which starts with this postal will be added to the filteredAddressRegister (Arraylist).
      Parameters:
      postal - the postal searched with.

    • searchByMunicipalCode

      public void searchByMunicipalCode​(java.lang.String municipalCode)

    • searchByMunicipalityName

      public void searchByMunicipalityName​(java.lang.String municipalityName)

    • searchByCategory

      public void searchByCategory​(char category)

    • getAddresses

      public java.util.Collection<Address> getAddresses()
      Returns:
      All addresses in the register

    • getAddressesBySearch

      public java.util.Collection<Address> getAddressesBySearch()
      Returns:
      all addresses from search.

    • clearRegister

      public void clearRegister()
      Removes all addresses from the register.
